text: On 6 October 2022, 34-year-old Panya Khamrab attacked a child care in Na Klang district, Nong Bua Lamphu province, Thailand. The attacker killed 36 people. He killed himself and his family after the attack. It is the deadliest mass murder in Thailand. == Attack == Panya Khamrab, the attacker, arrived at the nursery at around 12:50 ICT. Khamrab attacked the children and staff at the nursery with a gun and a knife. There were 30 children in the nursery when the attack happened. Khamrab escaped to his house with his pickup truck. He shot seven people on the way. He also hit bystanders with his vehicle. After he arrived at his house, he shot his wife and children. He then killed himself. == References == Category:2022 mass shootings Category:2020s in Thailand Category:2022 crimes in Asia Category:Mass murder in 2022 Category:Mass murder in Asia Category:Mass stabbings Category:School shootings in Asia Category:October 2022 events
title: 2022 Nong Bua Lamphu attack
